alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:32AM MDT until July 05 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PETROLEUM AND SOUTHWESTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 131 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of Flatwillow, or 17 miles southeast of Winnett, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Flatwillow, Mosby and Petrolia Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
